alright i i will have to admit that subzero is right in saying that proper instructions were not provided after extracting the file the size of the folder is 7.69GB then you have to run globe converter the problem is if you don't have enough disk space then the game won't work u need atleast 14 to 15 GB of free space in total to extract the game and then run globe conveter which is of course no given in instructions.After running converter all the extra files will be deleted and the game size will be around 5.10GB. All those who were not able to get past the loading screen then low disk space  or not running globe converter is the reason for that.
